headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Lester Contact Missions and More
content:
Buzz, buzz. Give Lester Crest a call on your iFruit this week to request a Job. All Lester Contact Missions are all doling out 2X GTA$ and RP.

Plus, it’s brutal out there. The 1% needs protection, too. Luckily, sheltering the elite is a career track all its own. This week, all Bodyguards and Associates’ salaries are tripled for laying down life and limb in the line of duty. Trickle-down economics in action.
